data.title: St. Charles Community Unit School District 303
data.text:
Returning Student Registration

Returning Student Registration for the 2024-2025 school year is now open. Click here for more information.

School Start & End Times

Updated 1-08-24: View the message about the start and end times for the 2024-2025 school year, beginning in the fall.

STC Park District is Hiring!

Join the St. Charles Park District's before and after school child care programs. Applications through the Park District open in June. Click here to learn more.

Expanding Child Care Services

Beginning in August, fee-based child care services will be available at additional locations with hours conducive to the new school schedule.

Boundary Updates

Click here to view approved boundaries for 2024-2025 for elementary, middle and high schools.

Listen Learn Return

See a summary from our latest community session on Academics.

District 303 Strategic Plan

Click here to view the draft Strategic Plan and process.

Board Meeting Live Stream & Information

Click here to view board agendas, live-streamed meetings, archived videos, and board policies.

Facility Master Plan

Click here to view the Facility Master Plan timeline of events, recent reports and FAQs.

D303 Technical Support Resources

Technical support resources for families and staff.
